name: MACRO
description: Used to record macros so you can start automating your workflow.

name: WORD
description: Move to the next word. Places you at the first character of the next word

modifiers.shift: finds words based on space and not letters

name: END
description: Move to the end of the next word. Places you at the first character of the next word

modifiers.shift: finds words based on space and not letters
modifiers.ctrl: Move the page up by 1 line

name: REPLACE
description: Replace the character your cursor is on

modifiers.shift: Enters replace mode, replacing characters until you het escape

name: TILL
description: Move the cursor to before the next occurrence of a char, to use type a char after the t. This is one of the hidden gems, I often use it to copt the contents between quotes.

modifiers.shift: Move the cursor to the previous occurrence

name: YANK
description: Copy the item into the clipboard.

modifiers.shift: Copy the current line
modifiers.ctrl: Move the page down by 1 line
modifiers.y<Movement Key>: Copy until where the movement will take you. For. e.g. y3 copies 3 lines, yw copies till the next word

name: UNDO
description: Undo the last change

modifiers.shift: Undo all the changes on the previously modified line

name: INSERT
description: Enter insert mode and start actually typing where the cursor is

modifiers.shift: Go to the start of the line and then enter insert mode

name: OPEN
description: Create a new line below and enter insert mode

modifiers.shift: Create the line above instead of below

name: PUT
description: Paste the contents of your clipboard at the cursor

modifiers.shift: Paste the contents of the clipboard before the cursor

name: APPEND
description: Enter insert mode on the next character

modifiers.shift: Enter insert mode at the end of the line

name: SUBSTITUTE
description: Delete the current character and enter insert mode

modifiers.shift: Delete the current line and enter insert mode

name: DELETE
description: Delete

modifiers.shift: Delete from the cursor to the end of the line
modifiers.d<Movement Key>: Delete until where the movement will take you

name: FIND
description: Move to the next occurrences of a char to the right

modifiers.shift: Move to the next occurrences of a char to the left

name: GOTO
description: g is used for a ton of different purposes find more at :h g

name: LEFT <
description: Move a character to the left

modifiers.shift: Move to the beginning of the page

name: DOWN V
description: Move to the next line

modifiers.shift: Join the next line into this line

name: UP ^
description: Move to the previous line

name: RIGHT >
description: Move to the next character

modifiers.shift: Move to the end of the page

name: ZZZZ
description: z is used for a ton of different purposes find more at :h z

name: X OUT
description: Delete a character

modifiers.shift: Backspace

name: CHANGE
description: Change until the given character

modifiers.shift: Change until the end of the line

name: VISUAL
description: Enter visual mode that allows you to select text by seeing the selection

modifiers.shift: Select the current line and enter visual mode

name: BACK
description: Move back one word

modifiers.shift: Select the current line and enter visual mode

name: NEXT
description: Move to the next occurrence of the last search

modifiers.shift: Move to the previous occurrence of the last search

name: MARK
description: Mark the current position ' can be used to jump to different marks which can be helpful in large files

modifiers.shift: Move to the center of the window

name: UNINDENT
description: Reduce the indentation level by 1

modifiers.shift: repeat the last FIND(f) / TILL(t)

name: INDENT
description: Increase the indentation level by 1

modifiers.shift: repeat the last FIND(f) / TILL(t)
